comment: He's really helpful when you need help, but make sure you stand up close to him during the presentations because he's pretty quiet. Also, for the content assessments, if your lecture professor doesn't assign readings, make sure to use google because he assumes that you're being assigned readings and they don't go along with the lab.

Very helpful during labs, but unclear in his instruction. He also didn't know when our final was or what it was over, so he was unprepared and we had no idea what to study for. Also, don't expect your content assessments to be graded in a timely manner. Nice guy, though.
Best lab teacher!!! Take my word and take him. He is easy going and helps you out whenever.

Professor Mower or "Charlie" is super cool yet nerdy in the best way. I had him for Chem Lab and he was always super helpful when performing the experiments and filling out the lab report. He is also fun to chat with while working. This class is an simple/easy A as long as you follow the procedures and remember to do the assessments on D2L.
